reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 147/10: PUBLIC BODIES AND COMMISSION PUBLIC BODIES - ETHICS EXECUTIVE FOR CERTAIN PUBLIC SERVANTS
reg_info.reg_name_text: Public Bodies and Commission Public Bodies — Ethics Executive for Certain Public Servants
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 147/10: PUBLIC BODIES AND COMMISSION PUBLIC BODIES - ETHICS EXECUTIVE FOR CERTAIN PUBLIC SERVANTS

content.content: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to every public body that is listed in Column 1 of Table 1.  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to every public body that is listed in Column 1 of Table 1.  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) For a public body listed in Column 1 of Table 1, the individual who holds the position listed in Column 2 of the Table is prescribed under subsection 71 (1.1) of the Act as the ethics executive for public servants, other than government appointees, who work in the public body.  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 2 (1). (2) For a public body listed in Column 1 of Table 1, the chair of the public body is prescribed under subsection 71 (1.1) of the Act as the ethics executive for public servants who are government appointees and who work in the public body.  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 2 (2). (3) Despite subsection (2), the Chief Adjudicator of the Ontario Securities Commission, Capital Markets Tribunal is prescribed under subsection 71 (1.1) of the Act as the ethics executive for public servants who are government appointees and who work in the Ontario Securities Commission, Capital Markets Tribunal. O. Reg. 441/22, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) For a public body listed in Column 1 of Table 1, the individual who holds the position listed in Column 2 of the Table is prescribed under subsection 71 (1.1) of the Act as the ethics executive for public servants, other than government appointees, who work in the public body.  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 2 (1).

(2) For a public body listed in Column 1 of Table 1, the chair of the public body is prescribed under subsection 71 (1.1) of the Act as the ethics executive for public servants who are government appointees and who work in the public body.  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 2 (2).

(3) Despite subsection (2), the Chief Adjudicator of the Ontario Securities Commission, Capital Markets Tribunal is prescribed under subsection 71 (1.1) of the Act as the ethics executive for public servants who are government appointees and who work in the Ontario Securities Commission, Capital Markets Tribunal. O. Reg. 441/22, s. 1.

content.content: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 147/10, s. 3.
